hero_subtitle: Create a Fast, Easy, Flexible and Efficient Data Infrastructure that grows with you thanks to Renoir
hero_title: You need a Brush to paint a Data Masterpiece
about_us_subtitle: Databrush is built on decades of expertise in designing distributed infrastructures for data analytics. Led by Davide, Luca, and Fabio, and supported by Gianpaolo and Alessandro from Politecnico di Milano it combines technological innovation and strategic vision to tackle the most complex challenges.
stats_subtitle: Is just the beginning but it keeps growing
services_subtitle: We offer companies the ability to exploit the full potential of their data
services_item_1_description: For companies that needs a powerfull and flexible platform to manage their data and analytics.
services_item_2_description: For companies that needs to extract value from their data and make data-driven decisions.
services_item_3_description: For companies that needs to scale their data infrastructure and analytics.
features_subtitle: Renoir has several features that make it a great choice for your company data infrastructure
features_item_1_description: Built with Rust, ensuring high performance and reliability. Renoir is designed to perform even in the most critical tasks.
features_item_2_description: Design to handle real-time data streams, Renoir is the perfect choice for companies that need to process data when they are generated.
features_item_3_description: Easily customizable to perform even the most complex tasks for every vertical scenario, making it the ultimate solution for your needs.
features_item_4_description: Optimized for speed and performance to ensure insights are delivered quickly and efficiently.
features_item_5_description: Designed with user-friendliness in mind, thanks to its high-level API, Renoir is easy to use and integrate with your existing infrastructure.
features_item_6_description: The engine of Renoir is open source, allowing the community to contribute and improve the platform.
use_cases_item_1_description: Optimize you decision and forecast your trends by analyzing billions of data in real-time all without the high cost of traditional infrastructure.
use_cases_item_2_description: Reduce downtime and maximize efficiency with continuous machine monitoring and real-time data analysis, ensuring smooth and efficient operations.
use_cases_item_3_description: Leverage Renoir and our expertise in the field to uncover new opportunities and optimize business strategies, even with limited existing infrastructure.
faq_item_1_title: How do I start using Renoir?
faq_item_1_description: You can start usign Renoir following the quick start guide in the documentation. It is easier than you think. If you need help, you can reach out to our support team.
faq_item_2_description: Renoir is a powerful and flexible platform it is designed to scale with your company and adapt to your needs. This means that you can focus on what really matters: your business. It cuts down the time to market, operetional cost and allows you to make data-driven decisions.
faq_item_3_title: Where can I find more information about Renoir?
faq_item_3_description: If you need more information about Renoir, you can visit our documentation page. There you will find all the information you need to start using Renoir. More technical information can be found in the GitHub repository. Lastly if you want to read use cases or research papers, you can visit our blog.
faq_item_4_title: Can I try Renoir before buying?
faq_item_4_description: Yes, the engine of Renoir is and always will be open source. You can try it and use it for free. Be part of our community and help us to improve the platform. If you need more from Renoir, you can always upgrade to the enterprise version.
faq_item_5_title: How can Databrush help my company?
faq_item_5_description: Databrish is a team of experts in data analytics and distributed infrastructures. We can help you to design and implement the best data infrastructure for your company. We can help you to extract value from your data and make data-driven decisions. We can help you to scale your data infrastructure and analytics. If you want to know more about how we can help you, you can contact us.
faq_item_6_description: Renoir is born after years of experience in designing distributed infrastructures for data analytics. We saw that there was a need for a real-time streaming framework that was easy to use, scalable and reliable; withouth reducing the performance. Renoir is the answer to that need. It is designed to be the ultimate solution for your data infrastructure.
contact_subtitle: Whether you have a question about features, trials, pricing, need a demo, or anything else, our team is ready to answer all your questions.
contact_textarea_placeholder: HI, I would like to know more about Renoir and how it can help my company.
contact_disclaimer_label: By submitting this contact form, you acknowledge and agree to the collection of your personal information.
contact_description: Our support team typically responds within 24 business hours.
cta_title: Be a part of our vision
cta_subtitle: Join the Renoir community and start building your data infrastructure today.
roadmap_subtitle: Our vision is to create something that is easy to use, powerful, and flexible. We are working hard to make Renoir the best tool for managing and analysing your data.
roadmap_phase_1_description:
• Evaluation with real-world use cases
  • Geo-distributed deployments
  • Domain-specific programming abstractions
roadmap_phase_2_description:
• New platform to create and manage Renoir's workflows
  • AI-driven tools to streamline pipeline creation
  • API support for easy external tool integration
roadmap_phase_3_description:
• Renoir Cloud where pipelines run on our infrastructure
  • Host webinars and workshops for faster onboarding
  • Overall improvements to the platform based on user feedback
contact_hero_subtitle: In Databrush we are always open to new partnerships, collaborations, and opportunities. We are here to help you with any questions you may have.
contact_form_subtitle: For quicker answers, explore our FAQs section. You may find the solution you're looking for right there! If not, the Databrush team is delighted to help you. Use the form below or write to us at info@databrush.it
contact_support_item_1_description: Chat with us for general questions, feedback, suggestions, or any other inquiries not covered by the other support categories.
contact_support_item_2_description: Chat with us for sales inquiries, custom projects, partnerships, or other business-related matters.
contact_support_item_3_description: Chat with us for technical issues, bugs, feature requests, or any other technical inquiries.
about_hero_title:
Decades of experience in
Data Infrastructures
about_hero_subtitle: Databrush is built on decades of expertise in designing distributed infrastructures for data analytics. Led by Davide, Luca, and Fabio, and supported by Gianpaolo and Alessandro from Politecnico di Milano it combines technological innovation and strategic vision to tackle the most complex challenges.
about_strengths_subtitle: We are a team of experts in data infrastructures, data analytics, and distributed systems. Born from the Politecnico di Milano, our team is based on years of intense research and development in the field of data analytics. Always up to date with the latest technologies, we are ready to face any challenge.
about_strength_1_description: We design and implement distributed infrastructures for data analytics. Thanks to our expertise, we can provide the best solutions for your business whether you are a small company or a large corporation.
about_strength_2_description: We know how to extract value from your data. Our team of experts will help you to understand your data and to make the best decisions for your business.
about_strength_3_description: We know how to make your data fly. Our solutions are designed to be fast and efficient, so you can get the most out of your data in the shortest time possible.
about_values_subtitle: We are committed to providing the best solutions for your business. Our values are the foundation of our success and the key to our future growth.
about_value_1_description: We based our business on the needs of our customers. We are always looking for new ways to improve our services and to provide the best solutions for your business.
about_value_2_description: We are and always be researcher at heart. We are always looking for new technologies and new ways to improve our services.
about_value_3_description: We believe in the power of open source. We are always looking for new ways to contribute to the community and to share our knowledge with others.
